desc: A Tin Roof favorite that has turned into a Charlotte favorite.  These boys from ATL have built up one heck of a following with there high energy never know what song is coming up next or mashed into the one there singing set list.   Its a 1000% party when they're in town.

event: White Hot Labor Day Weekend Sunday Bash
desc: It's going to get WHITE HOT at the Tin Roof Labor Day Weekend Sunday Bash . Wear your best white outfit while enjoying whip cream shots and live music by the Armory! Get ready to come early and stay late! NO COVER!
We are the spot to catch the game, whatever game it is, NFL or College! Tons of TVs, drink specials, great food and a friendly Crew! Go Panthers!
Prepare to witness the most rockin’ show in the Southeast!
Come see the infamous Matt Bennett Band live at the Roof!
Singer/songwriter Spencer Rush at the Roof
Rock n' Roll as it ought to be!
Atlanta's Mic Larry gets the weekend rockin' at the Roof!
